remarks: Partial isomorphism A of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
diam.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
diam.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diam.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diameetN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. dom I /\ Y e. dom I ) ) -> ( I ` ( X ./\ Y ) ) = ( ( I ` X ) i^i ( I ` Y ) ) ) $.
